messages.subject: New List: HEM List Owners discussion list
messages.msgSnippet: If you own or moderate an email discussion list, or have often thought about starting your own list, join us on the new HEM-ListOwners discussion list for
messages.messageBody:
If you own or moderate an email discussion list, or have often
thought about starting your own list, join us on the new
HEM-ListOwners discussion list for support, encouragement, and
information about running email discussion lists, especially through
the powerful YahooGroups network.

To join the list send a blank email message to:
HEM-ListOwners-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

Or visit the web site:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HEM-ListOwners

Helen Hegener, Managing Editor
Home Education Magazine
HEM-Editor@...
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com
~Ask me about HEM's email lists! ~
